General.Name: Yangzhou Asiastar Bus Co Ltd
General.Description: Yangzhou Yaxing Motor Coach Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacturing, and sales of passenger cars in China. It provides intercity, city, electrical, hybrid, hydrogen fuel cell, school, and special buses, as well as coaches under the Asiastar, FTBCI, and Wertstar brand names. The company also exports its products to Eastern Europe, North America, Australia, Southeast Asia, Russia, the Middle East, Africa, and other countries. Yangzhou Yaxing Motor Coach Co., Ltd. was founded in 1949 and is based in Yangzhou, China.
